ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] Fun on Rodcet Nife
ygData.msgSnippet: I might come over there, but I doubt it. I think EQ is over for me. I just left the game giving my account to a good friend in my guild. It was one of the
ygData.messageBody:
I might come over there, but I doubt it. I think EQ is over for me. I just
left the game giving my account to a good friend in my guild. It was one of
the hardest things I've ever done hehehe I was a lvl 52 necro with over 100
days played time and a prominent member of the #1 guild on the Saryrn server
heh. Dunno if I want to get that addicted to eq again it was bad heh..


>From: "David Lari" <kerik@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_rainbow@egroups.com
>To: "EQ_rainbow" <EQ_rainbow@egroups.com>
>Subject: [EQ_rainbow] Fun on Rodcet Nife
>Date: Thu, 13 Jul 2000 08:08:39 -0400
>
>Not sure if it was mentioned on EQ_Rainbow, but last night we had a big
>Mystic Alliance guild event on Rodcet Nife. It was called MegaPlat and
>consisted of a lottery (the grand prize was 665 plat) and raffles of
>various
>items (armor, jewelry, weapons, etc.)
>
>We had around 20 guild members on at the same time and that set a record
>for
>us, I believe. A lot of people have been moving over to the Rodcet server
>and this event was a great way for them to get some nice equipment.
>
>Joe and Rob did a great job of coordinating and running the event. Thanks
>guys.
>
>If anyone else wants to create characters on Rodcet, we invite you to come
>join us. We'll be happy to help you out as you start new characters. We're
>quickly making Rodcet the San Francisco of Norrath and you are welcome to
>join the fun.
>
>David
>Kerik, Wood Elf Druid
>
